General.Name: Qingdao Kutesmart Co Ltd
General.Description: Qingdao Kute Smart Co Ltd. manufactures and sells men's, women's, and children's wear in China and internationally. The company offers tops, pants, shirts, dresses, coats, trench coats, underwear, suits, trousers, shirts, vests, jackets, sweaters, dresses, and other categories. It also operates stores. The company was formerly kown as Qingdao Kaimiao Garment Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Qingdao, China.
